summary: Are you interested in playing Bishop from Skyrim Romance Mod as your main character? Here you are! Download, enjoy and have fun with this nice guy :-)
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Comic Sans MS]

[size=5]BISHOP[/size]


[/font][size=3][font=Comic Sans MS]For one of my cinematic cut projects on my [url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCoWsDNCJ0vqTRJ17k3-1jbg]Youtube channel[/url], I made Bishop to my main character. He is not just transfered as file from Skyrim Romance Mod, but made by myself based on Skyrim Romance Mod. I´ve spent a lot of hours working on him, and I think the result is quite nice. 

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/81718-0-1485203689.png[/img][/font][font=Comic Sans MS] 

[/font][font=Comic Sans MS]Watch Bishop in my "[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jJjZtaho_Rc&list=PLOTv0bLlRyhxXykskxXRLs2rC7kl3uzKB]Rigmor of Bruma[/url]" adventure, if you want to see him in action.[/font][font=Comic Sans MS] 

Required:
[/font][font=Comic Sans MS]1. [url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE[/url]
[/font][font=Comic Sans MS]2. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]RaceMenu v. 3.4.5[/url]
[/font][font=Comic Sans MS]3. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]Apachii Hair Male[/url]
[/font][font=Comic Sans MS]4. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The Eyes of Beauty[/url]
[/font][font=Comic Sans MS]5. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2488/?]Better Male Bodies - Geonox Faces and any body type of your choice[/url]
[/font][font=Comic Sans MS]6. [/font][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?][font=Comic Sans MS]Brows[/font][font=Comic Sans MS] [/font][/url][font=Comic Sans MS]

[/font][font=Comic Sans MS]Installation: [/font][font=Comic Sans MS]Use NMM to easily install file

[/font][font=Comic Sans MS]- or -

[/font][font=Comic Sans MS]1. download and unzip the .RAR and search for: "Bishop.jslot"
[/font][font=Comic Sans MS]2. locate your presets folder in your Skyrim Directory (ex. C:\Program Files\Steam\steamapps\common\skyrim\data\SKSE\plugins\CharGen\Presets)
[/font][font=Comic Sans MS]3. put "Bishop.jslot" in your Presets folder.
[/font][font=Comic Sans MS]4. open the game and type "^" to open the console.
[/font][font=Comic Sans MS]5. type "showracemenu" to activate RaceMenu,
choose Nord race.
[/font][font=Comic Sans MS]6. you´ll find Bishop at the Presets slider.

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/81718-0-1485199375.png[/img]

[/font][font=Comic Sans MS]
[/font][font=Comic Sans MS]Have fun with this nice guy :-)

[/font][/size][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]My other preset:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/82835/]"Manouche"[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/82911/]"Rebekka"[/url]

Permission:
Do NOT make a follower of this or my other preset without my permission.[/size][/font][size=3][font=Comic Sans MS]



Credits:

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71754/?]Skyrim Romance Mod[/url] 
[/font][/size][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]for giving me permission to puplish him in my own variant, based on their variant, as shown in the pictures and in the videos.[/size][/font]
[size=3][font=Comic Sans MS]
Bethesda
[/font][/size][/center]
author: Louisharee Zan
